title: 768: BITCOIN SENTIMENT IN ‘WILD’ DIVERGENCE FROM REALITY AS $53K BTC TRIGGERS EXTREME FEAR - BTFD ALERT!!
description:
Bitcoin has stabilized at around $55K after dropping by $6K in a single day - but crypto sentiment is still in shock.

Meanwhile, Salvadoran President Nayib Bukele bought the Bitcoin dip again, investing more than $5 million into BTC as price dropped under $54K Friday.

With the addition of the 100 Bitcoin, El Salvador now holds 1,220 BTC, worth roughly $66.3 million.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:author: Justin Verrengia
itunes:subtitle: Bitcoin has stabilized at around $55,000 after dropping by $6,000 in a single day — but crypto market sentiment is still in shock. BTC price action is just 20% from all-time highs, but the market has reentered "extreme fear" for the first time since...
